metadata.title: CVE-2023-47465 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in GPAC v.2.2.1 and before allows a local attacker to cause adenial of service (DoS) via the ctts_box_read function of filesrc/isomedia/box_code_base.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
